M10/1/A1HIN/HP2/HIN/TZ0/XX




       22100130


HINDI A1 – HIGHER LEVEL – PAPER 2
HINDI A1 – NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR – ÉPREUVE 2
HINDI A1 – NIVEL SUPERIOR – PRUEBA 2

Friday 14 May 2010 (morning)
Vendredi 14 mai 2010 (matin)
Viernes 14 de mayo de 2010 (mañana)

2 hours / 2 heures / 2 horas


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Answer one essay question only. You must base your answer on at least two of the Part 3 works
  you have studied. You may include in your answer a discussion of a Part 2 work of the same
  genre if relevant. Answers which are not based on a discussion of at least two Part 3 works will
  not score high marks.
 You are not permitted to bring copies of the works you have studied into the examination room.

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Traitez un seul sujet de composition. Vous devez baser votre réponse sur au moins deux
  des œuvres de la 3e partie que vous avez étudiées. Le cas échéant, vous pouvez inclure
  dans votre réponse une discussion sur une œuvre du même genre littéraire étudiée dans
  la 2e partie du programme. Les réponses qui ne sont pas basées sur au moins deux des
  œuvres de la 3e partie n’obtiendront pas une note élevée.
 Vous n’êtes pas autorisé(e) à amener des exemplaires des œuvres que vous avez étudiées
  dans la salle d’examen.

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Elija un tema de redacción. Su respuesta deberá basarse en al menos dos de las obras
  estudiadas en la Parte 3. Se podrán hacer comentarios sobre una obra de la Parte 2 del
  mismo género, si fuera necesario. Las respuestas que no incluyan una discusión sobre al
  menos dos obras de la Parte 3 no recibirán notas altas.
 No se permite traer a la sala de examen copias de las obras estudiadas.




2210-0130                                                                                   3 pages/páginas

naIcao ilaKo hue ivaYayaaoM maoM sao iksaI ek pr inabaMQa ilaiKe.[sa Baaga maoM Aapka ]<ar Baaga 3 kI pZ,I hu[- rcanaaAaoM maoM sao kma sao kma
dao rcanaaAaoM pr AaQaairt haonaa caaihe.Aap Baaga 2 maoM pZ,I hu[- [saI p`kar kI kRityaaoM kI vyavahairk cacaa- kr sakto /saktI
hOM prntu yao Baaga tIna maoM pZ,I hu[- dao kRityaaoM sao Aitir@t haonaI caaihe.Aap Anya kRityaaoM kI cacaa- kr sakto hOM prntu Aapka
inabanQa [na pr AaQaairt nahIM haonaa caaihe.

kivata

1.     kuC kivatae^M pazkaoM ko mana pr sqaa[- Cap CaoD, dotI hOM AaOr ]na kivataAaoM maoM p`yau@t kuC Sabd AaOr pMi@tyaa^M kivata kao
       p`BaavaI evaM Aqa-pUNa- banaatI hOM.ijana dao kivayaaoM kI kma sao kma dao kivataAaoM kao Aapnao pZ,a hO ]nakI kuC pMi@tyaaoM kao
       ]wRt krto hue kivayaaoM Wara p`yau@t saaQanaaoM ka ivaSlaoYaNa kIijae.


2.     “rcanaa, SaOlaI Aqavaa kond`Iya ivacaar kivata ko AavaSyak AMga hOM.” ApnaI pZ,I hu[- dao kivayaaoM kI kma sao kma dao kivataAaoM
       kI tulanaa ko AaQaar pr bata[e ik iksa p`kar kivayaaoM nao ApnaI SaOlaI evaM rcanaa kaOSala ka ]pyaaoga kivata maoM p`stut
       ivacaar kao p`kT krnao ko ilae ikyaa hO ?



]pnyaasa

3.     Apnao pZ,o hue kma sao kma dao ]pnyaasaaoM kI tulanaa ko AaQaar pr bata[e ik ]naka AMitma Baaga iksa p`kar phlao kI GaTnaaAaoM
       sao AiBanna $p sao jauD,a huAa hO ?


4.     ]pnyaasakar AtIt kI GaTnaaAaoM evaM paOraiNak Aa#yaanaaoM ko maaQyama sao vat-maana jaIvana, maUlyaaoM evaM QaarNaaAaoM ko sakara%mak
       Aqavaa nakara%mak pxa kao p`stut krnao ka p`yaasa krta hO.Apnao pZ,o hue kma sao kma dao ]pnyaasaaoM ko AaQaar pr bata[e
       ik ]pnyaasakaraoM nao ApnaI rcanaaAaoM maoM AtIt kI GaTnaaAaoM Aqavaa paOraiNak Aa#yaanaaoM ka iksa saImaa tk ]pyaaoga
       ikyaa hOO ?



khanaI

5.     khanaI khnao ko k`ma maoM baItI hu[- GaTnaaAaoM kao saMxaop maoM duhranaa evaM pirisqaityaaoM maoM pirvat-na, khanaI klaa kI dRiYT mao khanaI
       kao samaRw krto hOM.ApnaI pZ,I hu[- kma sao kma dao khainayaaoM ko AaQaar pr bata[e ik kOsao khanaIkaraoM nao [namaoM sao iksaI
       ek tknaIk ko saharo ApnaI khanaI kao samaRw banaayaa hOM ?


6.     “khanaI hmaoM baMQanaaoM sao mau@t kr - dUsaraoM ko baaro maoM jaananao samaJanao ka Avasar p`dana krtI hO.” ApnaI pZ,I hu[- kma sao
       kma dao khainayaaoM ko AaQaar pr bata[e ik yao khainayaa^M Aapkao kOsao dUsaraoM ko baaro maoM jaananao samaJanao maoM tqaa sahanauBaUit,
       samaanauBaUit ka Baava jagaanao maoM sahayata p`dana krtI hMO ?


2210-0130
                                                                    –3–                          M10/1/A1HIN/HP2/HIN/TZ0/XX

naaTk

7.      Apnao pZ,o hue kma sao kma dao  naaTkaoM ko AaQaar pr naaTkkaraoM Wara p`stut ‘s~I-ivamaSa-’ Aqavaa naarI jaIvana kI samasyaaAaoM
        kI tulanaa krto hue bata[e ik ivaiBanna naarI pa~aoM nao naaTk kao samaJanao maoM dSa-kaoM kI @yaa sahayata kI hO ?


8.     naaTk ko ivaYayavastu ko ivakasa maoM ‘hasya-vyaMgya’ tqaa ‘maanavaIya ~asadI’ daonaaoM mah%%vapUNa- hOM.Apnao pZ,o hue kma sao kma dao kI
       tulanaa krto hue ]pyau-@t kqana sao ApnaI sahmait Aqavaa Asahmait vya@t kIijae.



inabaMQa

9.      inabaMQakar $paMtr kI p`ikyaa sao Anaok ]dahrNaaoM, kqaa- p`saMgaaoM ko jaire sqaanaIya evaM ivaSvavyaapI jaIvana ka vaNa-na krta
        hO.ijana inabaMQakaraoM kao Aapnao pZa hO, ]nako kma sao kma dao inabaMQaaoM ko AaQaar pr ivaYaya kao p`stut krnao ko ilae $paMtr
        kI tulanaa kIijae.


10. inabaMQaaoM maoM laoKkaoM ko ivacaar, Baava va ]nakI inajaI AnauBaUityaa^M evaM vyai@tgat SaOlaI ]Bar kr pazkaoM ko saamanao AatI hOM.
    Apnao pZ,o hue inabaMQakaraoM ko kma sao kma dao inabaMQaaoM ko ivaYayavastu pr ivacaarivamaSa- krto hue batae^M ik laoKkaoM nao [namaoM sao
    iksa saaQana ko maaQyama sao pazkaoM kao baa^MQao rKnao maoM saflata p`aPt kI hO ?



saaQaarNa p`Sna

11. “saaih%ya maoM saMsmarNa evaM ‘yaa~a vaRtaMt’ ka mah%%vapUNa- sqaana hO.” Apnao pZ,o hue rcanaakaraoM kI kma sao kma dao rcanaaAaoM ko
    AaQaar pr ]nako saMsmarNa Aqavaa yaa~a vaNa-na kI ivaSaoYataAaoM kI tulanaa kIijae.


12. saaihi%yak rcanaaAaoM maoM laoKk A@sar laGaukqaa, Aa#yaana, ]dahrNa evaM dRYTaMtaoM ka sahara laota hO.ApnaI pZ,I hu[- kma sao
    kma dao rcanaaAaoM ko saMdBa- maoM [sa kqana kI ivavaocanaa kIijae.


13. saaih%yakaraoM nao ApnaI rcanaaAaoM maoM ‘WMW’ Aqaa-t dao prspr ivaraoQaI ivacaarQaaraAaoM ka saMGaYa- baar baar dSaa-yaa hO.iknhIM dao
    rcanaakaraoM kI kma sao kma dao kRityaaoM ko sandBa- maoM ‘WMW’ kI p`stuit kI tulanaa kIijae.


14. jaIvana ko p`it navaIna dRiYTkaoNa AaOr jaIvana ka AnauBava AcCo saaih%ya ko saRjana maoM sahayak hOM.ApnaI pZ,I hu[- kma sao kma
    dao rcanaaAaoM ko AaQaar pr [sa kqana kI samaIxaa krto hue bata[e ik Aap [sa kqana sao iksa saImaa tk sahmat hO ?
